techmeme.title: Music creation startup Splice buys London-based orchestral sound studio Spitfire Audio, a source says for ~$50M; sources say Splice has $100M+ in annual revenue (Anna Nicolaou/Financial Times)

How AI tools like Autistic Translator and Goblin Tools are helping those with autism and other neurodiverse people understand social situations (Andrea Jiménez/Washington Post)
A look at Interpol's innovation lab in Singapore for studying cybercrime, digital piracy, and more, and developing new techniques for bringing down criminals (Owen Walker/Financial Times)
